items.title: The Teachable
items.description: Skill is the learned behavior of repetition and desire to improve. In the thousands of touches on the puck or taps of the keyboard, we start to loose sight of what was once learned behavior, now view

items.title: I, Developed.
items.description: When I was a child, my parents helped me to develop. I had a loving home, that encouraged my growth and development in all aspects of life. Parents, thank you for developing your children this year

items.title: Arrival
items.description: Some decades, nothing happens. Other days, decades happen.That sentiment about sums up what the last few weeks have been like. As if everyone began to realize what we built, all at once, after years

items.title: NGDLE is really just Enigma misspelled
The LMS is Cable, We are Roku. Expect Us
Watch the ripples and you'll miss the waves
I challenge you to Transform Education; together
NGDLE, OER, Cost reduction, accessibility and Decentralization: the future of our institutions.
In my own words: Zero cost education.
Creating the decentralized instructional experience app
Using Webcomponents to unearth the NGDLE
Singularity, Digital Activism, and saving our institutions
Sustainable Systems Development: A moral issue
Go time
items.description:
The year is 2024, but do you know what season of life it is?
I ask myself this a lot recently. What season is it? Seasons of life are different than seasons of the year but represent themes in the sa
